reviews.review_text: My first experience with rubber base. (The color seems more of a light tan to me. ) Application is a bit of a learning curve, but once cured, I liked it. I haven't top coated it as yet, but I was inspired enough to order two more colors!

reviews.title: Didnt stay on my nails.
reviews.review_text: Didnt stay on my nails. Peeled off my index finger within a day.

Formula works well and find my applications lasting longer with this as a base. Application takes some practice as the formula is thicker than most other polishes. I gave this a low rating though because the color displayed on the online images is no where near the products actual color. This is a very pale pink color. Nothing like what is pictured here.

reviews.title: The color sent to me
reviews.review_text: The color sent to me was nearly white and simply not the right product. Customer service was friendly and gave me a discount code. It's sad that I can't get the actual product though.
